abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings indicate a satisfactory project
            outcome, likely sustainability, with modest institutional
            development impacts. This Simplified Implementation
            Completion Report (SICR) provides the following findings and
            implications for subsequent operation(s). The project sought
            to continue supporting Government's efforts to
            stabilize the macroeconomic environment, improve the
            investment climate, and strengthen economic institutions.
            While progress continued in each of these areas, on the
            institutional front, notable achievements included the
            establishment of the Energy Regulatory Commission, and the
            Anti-Corruption Commission, with some progress in
            strengthening tax administration and banking sector
            regulation by the Bangladesh Bank. However, these can only
            be viewed as incremental steps in what is necessarily a
            long-term and complex process of institutional building.
            Future operations need to be realistic in setting goals in
            this area; since local capacity is very weak, therefore, the
            Bank and the donor community will need to stay engaged,
            providing support over a long period. Project experience
            confirms that strong country ownership is essential for the
            success of reforms, best when the designs of these are
            homegrown. The reform process in the banking sector, for
            example, progressed slower than initially anticipated, due
            to inadequate attention given to the political economy,
            considerations which led to setting some over-ambitious
            goals. The political difficulty of implementing energy price
            increases was seemingly, also underestimated in designing
            the reforms. Also important, are future adjustment
            operations, which should be more closely aligned to the
            budget. In this regard, the Bank team is working with the
            Ministry of Finance to enhance the policy orientation of the
            budget, through the development of a medium-term budget framework.
